alert.note: Alert for Bent County Including Las Animas; Otero County Including La Junta and Western Comanche Grasslands (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 11 at 4:35PM MST until December 12 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 5 PM MST MONDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 232 AND 235... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 232 and 235. * Winds...South 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 14 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Bent County Including Las Animas; Otero County Including La Junta and Western Comanche Grasslands
